exam.question: Rumors are everywhere, spreading fear, damaging reputations, and turning calm situations into ______ ones.

answer.explain: 句意： 谣言四起， 造成恐怖、 诋毁名声， 将原本的宁静化作一片混乱。tragic： 悲惨的； vulnerable： 易受影响的； suspicious： 多疑的。

sentences.sContent: the turbulent times of the French Revolution
sentences.sCn: 法国大革命的动荡时期

sentences.sContent: He has had a turbulent political career.
sentences.sCn: 他的政治生涯动荡不定。

sentences.sContent: ...Even during the turbulent years of last century...
...No wonder parents worry their own kids might spin out of control once they hit the turbulent waters of adolescence...

synos.tran: 骚乱的，混乱的；狂暴的；吵闹的

words.tran: 汹涌澎湃地；动荡地，骚动地
骚乱，动荡；[流] 湍流；狂暴
[分化] 浊度；浑浊；混浊度；混乱

trans.tranCn: 动荡的， 混乱的； 汹涌的， 狂暴的
trans.tranOther: a turbulent situation or period of time is one in which there are a lot of sudden changes
